tool.name: Relabel samples in collection
tool.description: for input into Amplicon Analysis Pipeline
tool.command: i=0 && #for $fq_pair in $fastqs_in i=\$((i+1)) && sample_id=\$(grep -v "^#" $new_labels | cut -f1 | paste -s | cut -f\$i) && cp "${fq_pair.forward}" \${sample_id}_forward.fastq && cp "${fq_pair.reverse}" \${sample_id}_reverse.fastq && #end for echo

param.name: fastqs_in
param.label: Collection of FASTQ forward and reverse (R1/R2) pairs
